scripts.publish-node: npm run build-node && npm publish dist-node
scripts.merge-browser: rm -f -r dist-browser ; mkdir -p dist-browser && cp src/bson-browser.js dist-browser/merged.js && cat src/hp-client-lib.js >> dist-browser/merged.js
scripts.minify-browser: terser --compress --mangle reserved=['Binary','Buffer'] -- dist-browser/merged.js > dist-browser/hotpocket-js-client.min.js && rm dist-browser/merged.js
scripts.build-browser: npm run merge-browser && npm run minify-browser
